content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `keep_only_names` which iterates over the provided list of words (`words`) and removes all words that do not start with a capital letter (eg, remove "dog" but keep "Dog").

Here is a simple solution in Julia using filter function.

```julia
function keep_only_names(words)
    return filter(word -> isuppercase(first(word)), words)
end
```
This function iterates over the list of words and checks if the first character (which we assume to be the only one since Julia uses Unicode for strings) of each word is an uppercase letter. If it is, that word stays in the resulting list; otherwise, it gets removed.
